New Blog Site

Hey, just thought I’d make an initial post to announce my switch to a statically generated blog site. Hopefully I can keep the content kicking AND still have neato features like RSS feeds, etc.

Here’s some terminal syntax highlighting:

$ jekyll /path/to/raw/site /path/to/place/generated/site

Ruby Highlighting

def foo
  puts 'foo'
end

How bout some Java?

class Simple {
	String kthx() { return "bye!"; }
}

How bout some Scala?

object HAI {
	def kthx = "bye!"
}
